name: Steve vs Sonic!!!!
description:
Version 1.0.0

Move with the arrow keys, jump with Z, hit with X and be cool.

Steve Minceraft and Sunic fite to death?!?!?!?!?!??!? YES

None of the music used here belongs to me.

Glide - Minecraft.

Super Sonic Racing, What I'm made of and Glimmering Gift - Sonic the Hedgehog.

Caramelldansen - Caramella Girls.

Sad Story - Mario Galaxy.

Made on Scratch 3.25.0
